<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Simple Crystal Magic](/Feats.aspx?ID=1148) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #148: Fires of the Haunted City](/Sources.aspx?ID=13) pg. 74</row>

**Archetype** [Crystal Keeper](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=34)

**Prerequisites**
[Crystal Keeper Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1146)

</column>

---

As long as you meditate before a gemstone worth at least 10 gp as part of your daily preparations, you are capable of seeing magic as flowing runes that reveal information about magic objects, and you can scribe a personal rune that represents you. You gain the [_read aura_](/Spells.aspx?ID=246) and [_sigil_](/Spells.aspx?ID=286) cantrips. You cast these cantrips as arcane innate spells at will. A cantrip is heightened to a spell level equal to half your level rounded up.
name: Simple Crystal Magic
